title: TrackWeight: Turn your MacBook's trackpad into a digital weighing scale
author: wtcactus
aiHeadline: MacBook trackpad now doubles as a scale, because who needs a trackpad when you can weigh your cat? Now you can finally measure your laptop's contribution to your weight gain!

title: Gemini with Deep Think achieves gold-medal standard at the IMO
author: meetpateltech
aiHeadline: AI proves it's smarter than high school mathletes, because apparently, solving complex equations is easier than understanding human emotions. Or maybe AI just skipped the part where math becomes irrelevant in real life.

title: UK backing down on Apple encryption backdoor after pressure from US
author: azalemeth
aiHeadline: UK gives up on forcing Apple to make encryption weaker, because apparently the US has better encryption than the UK. Or maybe the UK realized that weaker encryption just means more data breaches, and they don't want to be the laughing stock anymore.

title: AccountingBench: Evaluating LLMs on real long-horizon business tasks
author: rickcarlino
aiHeadline: AI now tackles accounting, because what's the point of being smart if you can't balance a spreadsheet? Maybe AI will finally figure out why my bank account is always in the red.

title: What went wrong inside recalled Anker PowerCore 10000 power banks?
author: walterbell
aiHeadline: Anker power banks recalled for overheating, because who needs a portable charger that doesn't explode? Now you can have a built-in fire hazard in your bag!
